This absolutely works. It also doesn't need to be cracked as it's only the files for the dlc, it just needs to be copied into your NV Data directory. Just make sure you're updated to v1.4/Update 7 FIRST otherwise it *will not* work.

1. Update NV to v1.4 with update 7. Crack the game and then leave the crack alone.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6532914/Fallout.New.Vegas.Update.7-SKIDROW

2. Copy the files from this download (below) and paste/move them into your main New Vegas Data directory. 

Copy these:
OldWorldBlues - Main.bsa
OldWorldBlues - Sounds.bsa
OldWorldBlues.esm
OldWorldBlues.NAM

Paste Here: *C:\Program Files (x86)\Bethesda Softworks\Fallout New Vegas\Data\ 
*Or wherever your main data directory is.

That's it. It should run after that. If it doesn't than maybe you have a mod conflict. This is as simple as it gets.
